import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'

import 'moment/locale/zh-cn'//配置成中文
import locale from 'antd/es/data-picker/locale/zh_CN'//配置成中文
import './index.scss'


const { Option } = Select
const { RangePicker} = DataPicker
